alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 9:04AM EST until January 20 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 degrees. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and northern Florida and southeast Georgia. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM EST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
